articles.title: Israelâ€™s Knesset Approves Motion to Annex Occupied West Bank
articles.description: Israel's Knesset has overwhelmingly approved a nonbinding motion to annex the occupied West Bank, a move condemned by the Palestinian Authority. This decision coincided with Israeli troops raiding multiple areas across the West Bank, resulting in the deaths of two Palestinian teenage boys and the arrest of at least 25 individuals.

articles.title: World Court Rules States Have Obligation to Cut Emissions
articles.description: The International Court of Justice ruled that states are obligated to reduce greenhouse gas emissions to protect Earth's climate, with failure to do so potentially violating international law. The court emphasized that a healthy environment is essential for the enjoyment of human rights, marking a historic victory for climate campaigners.

articles.title: Trump Administration to Strip EPA of Power to Combat Climate Crisis
articles.description: The Trump administration has drafted a plan to strip the Environmental Protection Agency of its authority to combat the climate crisis. The proposed rule change rescinds a 2009 declaration that allowed the EPA to regulate dangerous greenhouse gas pollution under the Clean Air Act.
